channel.title: New tabs?
channel.description:
In some servers I see the empty tab in the bottom left corner disabled - when u click nothing happens but in other servers u CAN click it and its ancients or in deltascape its info on clan chats. How do u make it disable / enable that tab and put stuff in it?
P.S. Its all the same client - silabsoft
Thanks

item.title: New tabs?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

In your initialize() method, where it loads the side bar interfaces, add this with them;

        setSidebarInterface(7, id);

Replace the ‘id’ with what interface you want that empty sidebar to open when clicked.

If you want to make a sidebar unclickable, then just add;

        setSidebarInterface(sideBarId, -1);

Replace the ‘sideBarId’ with the id of the sideBar which you want to disable.

Read full topic
